question: when did the YSR died?
answer: Jalagam Vengala Rao (commonly known as YSR), a prominent Indian politician who served as the Chief Minister of Andhra Pradesh, died in an air crash on September 3, 2009. The Mi-17 helicopter he was traveling in crashed into the Nagarjunasagar reservoir near Hyderabad during a heavy downpour, causing his untimely death along with fourteen others.
